text: Sano awala wawatemi mu nsinda (wa Madina) ni kulupilila nkanaiche wanganyao akuwa ali nkwanonyela wandu waasaamiile kukwao, soni ngaakuchisimana mâ€™mitima mwao chipaka chilichose mu ichindu yaapedwile (akusamao), soni akulongosyaga (isako ya achimijao pa chindu chilichose) kupunda isako yao, namuno angaliji ali nkuchisachilila (chinducho) kwanneso. Sano waakuwambasyidwa ku ubaili wa ntima wao basi wanganyao ni wali wakupunda
